dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, President Tokayev and the UAE Energy Minister, Suhail Al Mazrouei, were meeting on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, President Tokayev and the U A E Energy Minister, Suhail Al Mazrouei, were meeting on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with Suhail Al Mazrouei, Minister of Energy and Infrastructure of the United Arab Emirates, on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum (AIF), citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they mentioned that five billion dollars in agreements had just been signed between Kazakhstan and the UAE—that's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they mentioned that five billion dollars in agreements had just been signed between Kazakhstan and the U A E-that's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev described the meeting as productive, highlighting that more than 20 commercial agreements worth $5 billion had been signed. Kazakhstan and UAE signed agreements worth 5 billion dollars Al Mazrouei praised the organization of the Astana International Forum and expressed his gratitude for the warm welcome.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Tokayev described his earlier meeting with the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince as really productive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Tokayev described his earlier meeting with the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince as really productive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the President fondly recalled his recent talks in Astana with Abu Dhabi Crown Prince Sheikh Khaled bin Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan. Tokayev described the meeting as productive, highlighting that more than 20 commercial agreements worth $5 billion had been signed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Al Mazrouei seemed impressed with how well-organized the forum was, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Al Mazrouei seemed impressed with how well-organized the forum was, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Al Mazrouei praised the organization of the Astana International Forum and expressed his gratitude for the warm welcome.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They're already working on implementing those deals, which is pretty fast-moving for international agreements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're already working on implementing those deals, which is pretty fast-moving for international agreements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the UAE minister, work has already begun on fulfilling the deals signed during the Crown Prince's visit to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're aiming to boost bilateral trade up to a billion dollars, which is no small goal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're aiming to boost bilateral trade up to a billion dollars, which is no small goal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two officials discussed practical steps to implement the agreements reached at the highest level, including an initiative to boost bilateral trade to $1 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like energy, agriculture, and transport are the big focus areas for them right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like energy, agriculture, and transport are the big focus areas for them right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They also discussed key areas of cooperation, including energy, agriculture, and transport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The Astana Forum itself is all about connecting minds and shaping the future, which feels very timely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Astana Forum itself is all about connecting minds and shaping the future, which feels very timely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The forum's theme is "Connecting Minds, Shaping the Future."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's happening over two days, May 29th and 30th, bringing together governments, companies, experts…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's happening over two days, May twenty ninth and thirtieth, bringing together governments, companies, experts...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana International Forum is taking place on May 29"30. It serves as a platform for dialogue among governments, international organizations, major companies, and scholars to address global challenges, ranging from the economy and security to the environment and climate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just economic stuff—they're covering security, climate, you name it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just economic stuff-they're covering security, climate, you name it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It serves as a platform for dialogue among governments, international organizations, major companies, and scholars to address global challenges, ranging from the economy and security to the environment and climate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Tokayev's been busy—he also met with France's trade minister earlier, Laurent Saint-Martin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tokayev's been busy-he also met with France's trade minister earlier, Laurent Saint-Martin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, President Tokayev met with France's Minister Delegate for Foreign Trade, Laurent Saint-Martin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it seems like Kazakhstan's really pushing to strengthen ties on multiple fronts.
